-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### mean wind speed vs. u*
```{r}
scatter_plot_QCQA(data,vars_WS[1],vars_other_sonic[1],
                  "WS (m/s)","USTAR (m/s)",0)
```

```{r}

                  wind_std,
                  "USTAR (m/s)","W_SIGMA (m/s)",0)
```

```{r}
})
```
